channel.title: Rates on Kun Zhao — Ph.D. Quantitative Strategist

item.title: Yield Curve Construction & Bootstrapping
item.description:
A practical guide to building a smooth, arbitrage-free yield curve using bootstrapping and spline fitting. Includes implementations in Python and C++.

Features

  • Multi-curve support (OIS, Libor)
  • Spline / parametric fit for smoothness
  • Calibration to market instruments
